actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Executive Comment Requested from OMB, GSA, DOD, State, GAO.
Referred to Subcommittee on Government Activities and Transportation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Government Activities and Transportation

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to liberalize certain provisions authorizing reimbursement for expenses of sale and purchase of a residence upon the transfer of a Federal employee.

summary.text: Authorizes Federal agencies to reimburse an employee for the expenses of: (1) selling a residence at a post of duty in the United States upon being transferred to a post outside the United States; and (2) purchasing a residence at a post within the United States after being transferred from a post outside the United States. Prohibits such reimbursement if the sale or purchase occurs before the employee is notified that he or she will not be returning to the same post within the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to liberalize certain provisions authorizing reimbursement for expenses of sale and purchase of a residence upon the transfer of a Federal employee.
